body: I think its good dunno bout yall

I can say, without a shadow of a doubt, that this is the worst thing I have ever read

and I've read Inyouchuu
It even looks like he improved on his sloppy ass art in Vol. 3. BUT THE SHIT WILL PROBABLY NEVER GET TRANSLATED.

It's fucked up How the artist barley gave the 1st guy he introduced any screentime but from what ive skimmed of Vol. 3 it looks like he gets at least SOME page time, but guess fucking what? 2 YEARS LATER I STILL CANT FIND VOL.3 TRANSLATED ANYWHERE. So i guess ill never fucking know FUCK FUCK FUCK FUCK FUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUCK my life.
fuck bitches die fuck sperm mothfaka
This series are the fucking best
